description:
10 min to Manhattan via subway.  Short walk to several Restaurants, Cafes, Nightlife and Entertainment.

Located on a quiet tree lined street, yet close to the action and you can be in midtown Manhattan in 30 minutes by subway, or East Village in 10 min.  Good for couples, business travelers or solo adventurers enjoying their time in NYC

1 Bedroom Apt located on 1st floor, whole right side of house with exclusive access to backyard.

You may access the apt and backyard only.

I am available whenever necessary by phone or email.

Williamsburg is a great neighborhood with plenty of restaurants, cafes and nightlife close by.  It is also just a short subway or taxi ride to Manhattan.

L Train Subway stations Lorimer St and Graham Ave are both 2 blocks away.  G Train Subway station - Metropolitan Ave - 4 blocks away

I am happy to share my home with you.
name: Williamsburg, 1 Bedroom Apt w/ Private Backyard
review: Possibly one of the cleanest and most comfortable apartments in town. Great communication, everything as described. It was truly a pleasure to stay here.
